subject: My order status... SSN4637
description_text:
Hi! I ordered 5 days ago from you ( SSN4637 ), and I have no news, and it
was an express shipment...
I received the info about being cancelled, and now I have tracking (
SF3269866672416 ), but it's not active. What's going on?

Thanks,

*Jorge De Silva - Photography & Filmmaking*


www.jorgedesilva.com
www.instagram.com/itsjorgedesilva

conversations.body_text: Hi Jorge De Silva,  Your tracking number is 1ZJ455510425475417, which shows that the package has been signed for.
